# NSHashTableWeakMemory

**Global Variable**

Equal to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/weakMemory]. Uses weak read and write barriers appropriate for ARC or GC. Using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/weakMemory] object references will turn to `NULL` on last release.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSHashTableWeakMemory: NSPointerFunctions.Options
```

## Constants

- **NSHashTableStrongMemory**: Equal to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/strongMemory].
- **NSHashTableCopyIn**: Equal to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/copyIn].
- **NSHashTableObjectPointerPersonality**: Equal to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/objectPointerPersonality].
title: NSHashTableWeakMemory
